title: Drawing, "End Table", early 20th century
medium: Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
inscribed: Inscribed in red color pencil at upper margin, right: W.(traced over in graphite)-B-53; inscribed in graphite at lower right: SCALE 1 1/2"=1'0"/#803; Inscribed in graphite circled at lower right: 53/ 53/1/2/ 53 3/4; inscribed in graphite and circled at lower left: 2; inscribed instructions in graphite.
description: Elevation and plans for two versions of an end table. On the left is table with open shelf at top and two drawers below. Drawer on top is smaller than below; rectilinear pulls positioned towards the right. Left side of table has rounded edge.Table on the right has rounded edge on left and right sides. Open shelf at top, two drawers below. Drawer on top is smaller than below; rectilinear pulls positioned at center of drawers.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "End Table", early 20th century.
early 20th century. Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1988-101-1218.
